1.content: Bullies. They have been around since the dawn of man. Every single day, people have often dealt with these annoying creatures. Quite often without help. However, in the year 2018, all schools in the world passed a rule. Those who are bullied, may gang up on the bullies, and do whatever they want. You play the role of of a young cub, who wants to deal with your bullies in a rather...humiliating and smelly way. Now the question is...are you a boy or girl?
